barbarian equipment choice 1.prompt: Barbarian players have a choice of equipment between a Battleaxe or any Martial Melee Weapon. Use /sheet choice <option> to select one of your options and consume the "Equipment Choice 1" that is in your features section.

barbarian equipment choice 2.prompt:
Barbarian players have an additional choice of equipment between 2 Handaxes or any Simple Melee Weapon.
Be sure to specify "2 Handaxe" when making your /sheet choice or else it might be confused with the Simple Melee option of just one! As mentioned, use /sheet choice <option> to select your option and consume the "Equipment Choice 2" that is in your features section.

barbarian skill choice 1.prompt: Barbarian players have a choice of what skill they want to be proficient in. Use /sheet choice <option> to select your first skill and consume the "Skill Choice 1" that is in your features section.

barbarian skill choice 2.prompt: Barbarian players have an additional choice of what skill they want to be proficient in. Use /sheet choice <option> to select your first skill and consume the "Skill Choice 2" that is in your features section.
